• ★
  • inbuild
  • Chapter 5: Services for the Inform Compiler
  • Template Services

An Inform 7 website template.

§1. 

    typedef struct inform_template {
        struct inbuild_copy *as_copy;
        struct semantic_version_number version;
        MEMORY_MANAGEMENT
    } inform_template;

    inform_template *Templates::new_it(text_stream *name, pathname *P) {
        inform_template *T = CREATE(inform_template);
        T->as_copy = NULL;
        T->version = VersionNumbers::null();
        return T;
    }

The function Templates::new_it is used in 4/tm (§3).

The structure inform_template is accessed in 1/ic, 2/edt, 2/rqr, 2/nst, 3/is2, 3/is3, 4/lm, 4/pbm, 4/pfm, 4/tm, 4/pm, 5/kts, 5/es, 5/ed, 5/ed2, 5/ec, 5/ps, 5/ls, 5/ps2, 6/hdn, 6/inc, 6/vmg and here.
